tasks.task: Operating a farming machine to plow fields
subtasks: Starting the farming machine
Guiding the machine through the field
Adjusting the plow depth

tasks.task: Driving a tractor through a field
subtasks: Activating the tractor's GPS navigation system
Manual steering to align with rows
Braking the tractor when necessary
Loading crops into the planter
Adjusting the planter's depth and spacing
Operating the planter's seed dispensers

tasks.task: Using a sprayer to apply fertilizer
subtasks: Loading the sprayer with the chemical
Calibration of the sprayer's nozzles
Adjusting the spray pattern
Attaching the milking machine to the cow
Stimulating the cow to let down milk
Collecting the milk in the container
Loading the crops onto the trailer
Hitching the trailer to the truck
Driving the truck to the barn
Locating the damaged section of the fence
Removing the old fence panels
Installing new fence panels
Tightly securing the new panels
Collecting eggs from the nesting boxes
Removing soiled litter from the coop
Scrubbing the coop floors with a hose
Re-bedding the coop with fresh litter
Distributing hay to the horses
Pouring feed into the pig trough
Feeding the dairy cattle their rations
Providing water to the livestock
Activating the irrigation system controls
Monitoring water distribution across the field
Adjusting sprinkler heads for even coverage

** Checking fuel levels and refilling as needed

** Opening the coop door slowly
